definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
grain/granule/classifier for small round things (peas, bullets, peanuts, pills, grains etc)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: In batteries, charged particles travel through electrolytes.
sentences.chinese: 在電池裏，帶電粒子穿過電解液。

sentences.english: Then electric fields generated by the solar wind sweep away the charged particles.
sentences.chinese: 然後，太陽風產生的電場將帶電粒子一掃而空。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a charged-particle optical system with dual loading options.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及具有雙裝載選項的帶電粒子光學系統。

sentences.english: In this paper it is shown that there are two vector constants of the motion for a charged particle in the central field of force.
sentences.chinese: 證明了帶電粒子在有心力場中運動時有兩個守恆矢量。

sentences.english: The ambipolar diffusion coefficient of charged copper species in copper vapor laser is theoretically deduced.
sentences.chinese: 推導了銅蒸氣激光器帶電粒子的雙極擴散係數。

sentences.english: A new-type charged particle spectrograph has been proposed and built up.
sentences.chinese: 本文報導了一個新型的帶電粒子譜儀。

sentences.english: Studies of Jovian magnetosphere via local measurements of charged particle fluxes and by remote sensing of auroral emissions.
sentences.chinese: 研究木星磁層，測量與遙感帶電粒子的數量。

sentences.english: Electrically-charged particles are thrown towards the Earth and carried on the solar wind towards the upper part of our planet's atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 這些帶電粒子通過太陽風高速進入地球的高層大氣中。

sentences.english: After development, the paths of electrically charged particles appeared .
sentences.chinese: 顯影以後，就顯示出帶電粒子的徑跡來。

sentences.english: One way in which this energy can be supplied is by means of a charged-particle accelerator.
sentences.chinese: 其中一種方法是利用帶電粒子加速器來供給能量。

definition: Europa (moon of Jupiter), aka Jupiter II
asteroid belt between Mars and Jupiter
